title: Login as Club admin
custom_preconds:
(username/password: (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in 
AND the home dashboard will display

title: Go to Pro Player Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user is logged in
AND the Club user is viewing their Club's Roster Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Player Name Hyperlink for a player
custom_expected: THEN player's Profile should open in the same window

title: Open 7 Day Concussion DL tx from Create New
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a Pro Player Profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens Create New modal from Player History widget
AND user selects "Major" radio button on modal
AND user selects "Transactions" from first level dropdown 
AND user selects "Disabled List" from second level dropdown
AND user selects "Place on 7 Day Concussion DL" from third level dropdown
custom_expected: THEN system should open a new, preliminary Place on 7 Day Concussion DL transaction in edit mode

title: Submit 7 Day Concussion DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has opened a new, preliminary Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx from create new on a Pro Player Profile
AND user has filled out all required fields on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_submit rule checks 
AND once all rule checks have been passed or overridden system should submit the tx to BOC for approval
AND system should update the status of the tx to submitted
AND system should display blue successful save notification
AND system should generate an approvals item for BOC

title: Login as BOC Approver
custom_preconds:
(username/password: test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in 
AND the home dashboard will display

title: Open 7 Day Concussion DL tx from Pending Approvals Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver user is logged in
AND a club user has submitted a Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx to BOC for approval
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Pending Approvals widget on the Clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN the approval item for the 7 Day Concussion DL tx should be populated on the Pending Approvals widget 
AND "Type" should be a hyperlink to the submitted 7 Day Concussion DL tx
AND clicking "Type" hyperlink should open the submitted 7 Day Concussion DL tx in the same window

title: Click Approve on 7 Day Concussion DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_approve rule checks
AND once all rule checks have passed or been overridden system should update the tx status to "Approved"
AND successful Approval Notification should display
AND any clipboard items associated with the tx should be removed
AND new entry in black font should display for Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx in player's Player History

title: Click Reject on 7 Day Concussion DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification #78 is displayed
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status is reversed
AND pending player history entry is removed

title: Click Approve on 10 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted Place on 10 Day DL tx for a player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_approve rule checks
AND once all rule checks have passed or been overridden system should update the tx status to "Approved"
AND successful Approval Notification should display
AND any clipboard items associated with the tx should be removed
AND new entry in black font should display for Place on 10 Day DL tx in player's Player History

title: Click Reject on 10 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:

AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: Find player currently on 7 Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND one or more players from the logged in user's club are currently on the 7 Day Concussion DL
AND these players have been on the 7 Day Concussion DL for at least 7 days
AND user is viewing Roster widget for their club
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Player Name hyperlink in the roster widget for a player on 7 Day Concussion DL
custom_expected: THEN system should open the player's Pro Player Profile

title: Find player currently on Disabled List
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND one or more players from the logged in user's club are currently on the Disabled List (7 Day Concussion, 10 Day, or 60 Day)
AND current date is on or after Earliest Reinstatement Date from player's most recent DL tx
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Player Name hyperlink in the roster widget for a player on Disabled List
custom_expected: THEN system should open the player's Pro Player Profile

title: Open Reinstate from DL tx from Create New
custom_preconds: GIVEN club user has navigated to Pro Player Profile of a player on the DL from their org
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens Create New modal from Player History widget
AND user selects "Major" radio button on modal
AND user selects "Transactions" from first level dropdown 
AND user selects "Disabled List" from second level dropdown
AND user selects "Reinstate From DL" from third level dropdown

AND system should display blue successful save notification
AND system should generate an approvals item for BOC

title: Login as BOC Approver
custom_preconds:
(username/password: test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in 
AND the home dashboard will display

title: Open Reinstate from DL tx from Pending Approvals Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver user is logged in
AND a club user has submitted a Reinstate from DL tx to BOC for approval
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Pending Approvals widget on the Clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN the approval item for the Reinstate from DL tx should be populated on the Pending Approvals widget 
AND "Type" should be a hyperlink to the submitted Reinstate from DL tx
AND clicking "Type" hyperlink should open the submitted Reinstate from DL tx in the same window

title: Click Approve on Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted Reinstate from DL tx for a player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_approve rule checks
AND once all rule checks have passed or been overridden system should update the tx status to "Approved"
AND successful Approval Notification should display
AND any clipboard items associated with the tx should be removed
AND new entry in black font should display for Reinstate from DL tx in player's Player History

title: Login as Club admin
custom_preconds:
(username/password: (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:

AND the home dashboard will display

title: Find player that currently has one or more recertifications due
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND one or more players from the logged in user's club has one or more recertification due for their DL tx (7 Day Concussion or 10 Day)
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "DL Recertification" tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN the players with recerts due will appear in the widget with red date links associated with their past due recerts
AND player name will be a hyperlink
AND clicking player name will open the associated Pro Player Profile

title: Open DL Recertification tx from Recert Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN club user has navigated to their Recertification Widget from Transactions on the leftnav
custom_steps: WHEN user views a player row for a player that has one or more recertifications due
custom_expected:
THEN all past due recertifications will display as dates (mm/dd/yyyy) in red
AND red date will be a hyperlink 
AND clicking the date will open the associated recertification transaction for the player

title: Submit DL Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN club user has opened a new, preliminary DL Recertification tx from create new on a Pro Player Profile
AND user has filled out all required fields on the form
custom_steps: WHEN club user clicks submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_submit rule checks 
AND once all rule checks have passed or been overridden system should update the tx status to "Approved"
AND successful Approval Notification should display
AND no player history or status updates should be made as a result of this transaction

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:

title: Find player that currently has one or more recertifications due
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND one or more players has one or more recertification due for DL (7 Day Concussion or 10 Day)
AND current date is on or after Earliest Reinstatement Date from player's most recent DL tx
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the DL Recertification Widget from Transactions on the left nav
AND selects the Org for one of these players
custom_expected:
THEN the players with recerts due will appear in the widget with red date links associated with their past due recerts
AND player name will be a hyperlink
AND clicking player name will open the associated Pro Player Profile

title: Open DL recert tx from Create New
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user has navigated to Pro Player Profile of a player on the DL with a recert past due
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens Create New modal from Player History widget
AND user selects "Major" radio button on modal
AND user selects "Transactions" from first level dropdown 
AND user selects "Disabled List" from second level dropdown
AND user selects "DL Recertification" from third level dropdown
custom_expected: THEN system should open a new, preliminary DL Recertification transaction in edit mode

title: Click Approve on DL Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted DL Recertification tx for a player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_approve rule checks
AND once all rule checks have passed or been overridden system should update the tx status to "Approved"
AND successful Approval Notification should display
AND no player history or status updates should be made as a result of this transaction
